title: Notifications (com.apple.notificationsettings)
description: Configures Notification settings for iOS & macOS apps

NotificationsEnabled.title: Enable Notifications
NotificationsEnabled.description: Whether notifications are allowed for this app.

BundleIdentifier.title: App Bundle Identifier
BundleIdentifier.description: Bundle identifier of the target app

ShowInNotificationCenter.title: Show in Notification Center
ShowInNotificationCenter.description: Whether notifications can be shown in notification center.

ShowInLockScreen.title: Show on Lock Screen
ShowInLockScreen.description: Whether notifications can be shown on the lock screen.

SoundsEnabled.title: Sounds Enabled
SoundsEnabled.description: Whether sounds are allowed for this app.

BadgesEnabled.title: Badges Enabled
BadgesEnabled.description: Whether badges are allowed for this app.

AlertType.title: Alert Type
AlertType.description: The type of alert for notifications for this app. None/Banner/Alert

CriticalAlertEnabled.title: Enable Critical Alerts
CriticalAlertEnabled.description: Whether an app can mark notifications as 'critical', bypassing Do Not Disturb and ringer settings.
